WorkItem.ClosedComment: User misconception. Needs to mark a one hand enchant as available
WorkItem.Description:
I'm a mage and I've been using a staff and I just got a good one-hand, so I ran Optimizer with the JP off-hand selected to see what it recommended. To my surprise, it recommended enchanting the one-hand with Greater Spellpower (Staff)!
Â 
Attached is my file in which I still have the staff equipped but the new gear is marked available.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Optimizer suggests staff-only enchant for one-hand weapon

Comments.Message: The problem in this case is that that is the only weapon enchant that you have marked as available. While it is selected in the optimization result, it is not actually giving any stats.
